alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 3:47AM EST until March 12 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Vermont, Eastern Windham County. In New York, Eastern Columbia County. In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous due to snow covered roadways and low visibility. Gusty winds will contribute to blowing and drifting of snowfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates may reach close to one inch per hour during the day on Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
